Type Method# headTracked(soundStageSize:anchoringStrategy:)

visionOS 1.0+

```
static func headTracked(
    soundStageSize: AVAudioSession.SoundStageSize,
    anchoringStrategy: AVAudioSession.AnchoringStrategy
) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` is `AVAudioSession.HeadTrackedSpatialExperience`.## [See Also](/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionSpatialExperience-swift.protocol/headTracked(soundStageSize:anchoringStrategy:)#see-also)
